publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1406.1 Andrew Wilson: Europe-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1406) in the name of David McLetchie, insert at end "and encourages any moves towards the normalisation of Scotland's status as a nation within a confederal European Union with full rights and obligations as a member state." Supported by: Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Brian Adam*
